description_for_human: Accesses data for multiple companies. The model will ask which company you want to work with.
description_for_model: API for accessing corporate databases. ALWAYS start by calling the 'list_companies' function to get a list of available companies and their 'db_name'. Use the returned 'db_name' for all subsequent requests to access company-specific data. The OpenAPI specification for each company is available at the 'openapi_spec_url' returned by 'list_companies'.
